flowRoot.flowPara: If we have a pdf transform then docbookTransform is called by docbookToPdf and then the result fop file is transformed to pdf by using a fop processor.
Directory where the snippets files will be placed
Java class used to extract the snippets doc.Snippets.Snippetizer
All the directories will be scanned recursively
Snippets files placed in the specified snippets directory
The main.xml file previously copied to a temporary folder
main.xml file with the <programlisting> contents included and with tags for coloring the <programlisting> content
Transform profile: html or pdf - necessary for including/excluding parts that appear only in one type of document
Output file(s) depending on the type of transform: single html, multiple html, pdf
XSLT transform type as defined by one of the files: pdf.xsl, chunked.xsl, or onehtml.xsl
